thread.title: BRIEF-Kinder Morgan Canada Says While discussions On Trans Mountain Expansion Are Ongoing, We Are Not Yet In Alignment

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kinder Morgan Canada Says While discussions On Trans Mountain Expansion Are Ongoing, We Are Not Yet In Alignment

organizations.name: brief-kinder morgan canada says while discussions on trans mountain expansion are ongoing

text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Kinder Morgan Canada Ltd:
* KINDER MORGAN CANADA LIMITED ISSUES STATEMENT * KINDER MORGAN CANADA SAYS ISSUES STATEMENT IN RESPONSE TO FEDERAL FINANCE MINISTERâ€™S PRESS CONFERENCE EARLIER TODAY
* KINDER MORGAN CANADA SAYS WHILE DISCUSSIONS RELATED TO TRANS MOUNTAIN EXPANSION ARE ONGOING; WE ARE NOT YET IN ALIGNMENT AND WILL NOT NEGOTIATE IN PUBLIC. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
